General.Name: Kekrops S.A.
General.Description: Kekrops S.A. engages in the development, construction, and exploitation of real estate properties with a focus on maisonettes and luxury residences in Greece. It is also involved in purchase, lease, construction, and operation of hotels, hostels, summer accommodation, tourist kiosks, and other facilities. The company operates travel attractions and services tourists. Kekrops S.A. was founded in 1923 and is based in Psychiko, Greece.
